headline: Parker-Hannifin Corporation (PH): Among Stocks to Buy That May Be Splitting Soon
summary: We recently published a list of the 12 Stocks to Buy That May Be Splitting Soon. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Parker-Hannifin Corporation (NYSE:PH) stands against other stocks that may be splitting soon.
